txt.en: Talk to Gísil at the Mead Hall of Garsfeld
You have discovered the main camp of Half-orcs near Garsfeld. You are certain that Gísil would be pleased if many were slain.
'They received what they deserved, [placeholder]. Rohan will hold strong, no matter the foe.\n\n'Thank you for your aid.'
Half-orcs have been besieging Garsfeld for weeks, and the townsfolk are beginning to lose hope.
Half-orcs can be found in the camps to the north-east of Garsfeld.\n\nYou should thin out the encroaching forces in the hopes of encouraging the townsfolk of Garsfeld.
Gísil can be found in the Mead Hall of Garsfeld, south-west of the half-orc camp.\n\nYou should bring news of your victories to Gísil.
